dataList.content: ถึง<ruby=โถงดอกไม้ใหญ่><ต้าหัวทิง></ruby>(大花廳)แล้ว!
It wasn't long before our arrival to a new place within Daguanyuan was made known by the palanquin bearer's sonorous announcement.
อาคารใหม่อีกแล้วเหรอ...? แล้วไอ้เจ้าต้าหัวทิงเนี่ยมันแปลว่าอะไรกันฟะ?
อึม~ ถ้าจะว่ากันง่ายๆ แล้ว คงจะเป็นสถานที่ที่จัดงานเลี้ยงล่ะมั้งครับ?
เหะ... จัดงานเลี้ยงกันบน... สถานที่ใหญ่เท่าหมู่บ้านงั้นเหรอ...?
ตะ-ตรงนั้นใช่ทะเลสาบไหมครับ?
อะ นั่นคือบ่อน้ำครับ~
บะ-บ่อน้ำเหรอ...? โว้ว...
หลังเราไปถึงแล้ว เราจะได้ไปปาร์ตี้ต้อนรับผมและซีชุนต่อเลยครับ
อะ คุณโรดย้าคงไม่ได้ทานอะไรมานานแล้ว เชิญยัดเท่าที่ต้องการได้เลยครับ~
ฉันไม่คิดว่าตัวเองจะตื่นเต้นได้ขนาดนี้มานานแล้วนะเนี่ย…
โห้... นั่นใช่เรือไหมคะ? นี่คุณมีเรือด้วยเหรอเนี่ย?
อะฮ่า ใช่ครับ~ บางครั้งเราก็ออกไปร่องเรือด้วยเหมือนกัน
โอะ และก็อาคารของซีชุนอยู่อีกฝั่งนึงของบ่อน้ำนั่นเลยครับ!
<พวกนายแต่ละคนได้อาคารของตัวเองด้วยเหรอ?>
ใช่ครับ เพราะงั้นตอนที่ผมจากหงหยวนมา ผมเลยคิดว่าการอยู่พร้อมหน้าพร้อมตากันเนี่ยวิเศษมากเลยครับ
เช่นนั้นแล้ว… คงจะลำบากมากเลยสำหรับครอบครัวของท่านที่จะมาพบปะกัน
นั่นแหละครับ ทำไมเราแต่ละคนถึงได้อาคารแยกกัน
... นี่เราคุยเรื่องเดียวกันอยู่ละเปล่าเนี่ย?
หากเป็นเช่นนี้ล่ะก็ เราควรมาเอ็นจอยกับเวเคชั่น~ ที่บ้านพักของท่านหงลู่น้อยตั้งแต่แรกแล้วงั้นหรือ?!
นั่นคงยากแล้วล่ะครับ คุณดอนกิโฆเต้ ตอนที่ผมออกเดินทาง คุณย่าและผู้อาวุโสต่างพร้ำบอกบางสิ่งกับผม...
... "ทุกย่างก้าวจักนำเจ้าหวนคืนสู่เหย้าเมื่อถึงเวลา; เช่นนั้นแล้ว จงเฝ้ามอง และเฝ้ามองทุกสิ่งอย่างที่โลกมอบให้ก่อนหวนคืนสา"
... ผมเองก็สงสัยเหมือนกันว่าจะถึงเวลานั้นเมื่อไหร่… แต่เวลาช่างผ่านไปไวจนเวลานั้นได้มาถึงเสียแล้ว
Most Sinners did not welcome their turn. Some of them were even terrified of it.
Sometimes, they had to confront what they'd been avoiding all their lives.
And for some, important things that were once forgotten or lost were waiting for their return.
But their reluctance is really not surprising at all.
I don't think I'd welcome an opportunity to get my memories back with open arms if it was thrust upon me out of nowhere, especially if I was getting dragged there against my will.
But despite the fact that it couldn't be more obvious that his turn had arrived, Hong Lu was as tranquil as he always was.
He's always been able to remain aloof no matter what happens. Maybe it won’t be different this time, either.
But even so... can I judge that so hastily?
ท่านนายน้อยเป่าอี้แห่งตระกูลเจี่ยได้กลับมาแล้ว!
Again, with the palanquin bearer's deep, full-throated pronouncement of our arrival, the door opened.
เอาล่ะครับ คงจะเหนื่อยกันแย่เลย! เชิญเข้ามากันเลยครับ~
Leaving behind the Sinners, who were still reeling from the astronomical level of opulence at display, Hong Lu bounced lightly off the palanquin and moseyed into the building.
ช่างเป็น…
... ก้าวย่างที่เบาบาง ไร้ซึ่งความตื่นเต้นและกังวลใดๆ…
ถูกต้องครับ...
หนุ่มนั้นโตมาในบ้านดีๆ จะไม่กลัวหรืออะไรก็คงไม่แปลกหรอก... มันก็แค่นั่นไม่ใช่เรอะ?
อย่างไรนั้น ท่านไม่คิดว่าข้างในซอกมุมหัวใจของท่านหงลู่น้อยนั้นโหยหาต้องการพบครอบครัวบ้างหรือ?
Once we all left the palanquin...

dataList.place: ต้ากวนหยวน - โถงงาน ต้าหัวทิง
dataList.content: I find myself beset by overwhelming vastitudes and objects of great magnitude...
มีคนใช้กันกี่คนกันคะเนี่ย…?
อา เมื่อยามซวี(戌時)มาเยือน ท่านย่าจะออกมาหาเราครับ
ผมว่าหลังจากนั้นงานเลี้ยงถึงจะเริ่มครับ
<'ยามซวี'เหรอ...?>
ยามซวีหมายถึงช่วงเวลาตั้งแต่ 19:00 ถึง 21:00 ค่ะ ระบบเวลาแบบพิเศษนี้ถูกใช้ในบางภูมิภาคของภาคตะวันออกค่ะ
นอกจากนี้แล้ว...
... คุณย่าของคุณหงลู่ เจี่ยมู่นั้น เป็นประมุขของต้ากวนหยวนค่ะ ดังนั้นจึงไม่ใช่เรื่องที่ผิดอะไรหากจะมองว่าเธอเป็นคนคุมหงหยวนค่ะ
ญาติของนายคือ... หัวหน้าของ Wing สินะ
ใช่แค่ แต่เดี๋ยวท่านก็จะสละตำแหน่งให้ทายาทคนต่อไปแล้ว
อะไรทำให้เธอต้องการสละตำแหน่งหัวหน้าตระกูลในเวลาแบบนี้ด้วยล่ะ?
Outis, as she probably saw an ulterior motive behind every move, inquired.
ท่านบอกว่าเวลาของท่านใกล้เข้ามาแล้ว ว่าท่านแบกรับความรับผิดชอบนี้มานานเกินควรแล้วครับ
คงจะตกใจมากแน่เลยถ้าได้ยินว่าคุณจะเข้าร่วมศึกชิงตำแหน่งหัวหน้าตระกูลด้วยน่ะค่ะ
ฮิฮิ ไม่รู้สิครับ บางทีท่านอาจจะรับไหวก็ได้นะครับ
ไม่มีเหตุผลอะไรที่ผมต้องเข้าร่วมด้วย แต่... ก็ไม่มีเหตุผลอะไรที่ผมไม่ควรเข้าร่วมด้วยเดียวช่นกันครับ
โอ้ะ? คุณซีชุนกับคุณเหวยอยู่ตรงนั้นครับ ดูเหมือนพวกเขาจะเดินทางปลอดภัยดีนะครับ
Jia Xichun, who arrived before us, shot us the briefest glance… before looking away with exaggerated disinterest.
คะ-คุณซีชุนเธอหันหลังให้เราด้วยครับ…
Well, didn’t take long for things to become super awkward…
Oo, we must capture this opportunity to seat ourselves adjacent to young Xichun!
Too late... We are forever banned from ever getting anywhere near her...
Yet wherefore...?
We are no longer Jia Xichun's faction.
Her hostility is to be expected.
Things have changed.
Us versus them. In-group versus out-group.
Deception and treachery are natural parts of war.
An ally of today may as well become an enemy tomorrow…
And that’s a funny way to say “I don't have any friends”...
What did you just—
Ah, there are my parents.
H-hold on, we’re just walkin’ right up to ‘em? Blimey, at least tell us their names!
Aha. Father's name is Zheng of the Jia family. And in Daguanyuan, they call my mother Lady Wang.
I greet you for the first time since my departure.
Baoyu of the Jia family has returned home.
... You're early.
Bao… Dear Baoyu… it has been too many years…
To see you again after so long, I... it is so good to see your face.
Oh… I don’t know what I should even say…
The father, Jia Zheng's eyes dart nervously between us and Hong Lu.
Meanwhile, his mother gingerly brings him in for a careful embrace as though she was in the presence of something so utterly, deeply moving. It was... more than the pure joy of reunion.
So they're Hong Lu's parents...
Thank you so much for your hospitality. You have certainly spared no expenses.
So… who are these people you've come here with…?
While there aren’t too many of them, they are my friends I made out in the world.
... At least he’s not introducing us as his 'lackeys' like a certain someone I know.
Oi, that's—! Agh… ahem.
Hong Lu’s mother slowly turns around to look at us.
I mean, it’s a weird thing to say, but…
… somehow, it almost felt like she was looking down at each of us, one by one.
I am so glad to meet you all. Baoyu’s always been such a stubborn child… I’m sure he was quite the handful to accompany you on your journeys. I hope you can still embrace him despite every—
Stubborn? Hong Lu?
Hmmmh...
Whatever it was she said, they don't seem all too happy to hear that...
Dear Baoyu…
Why do you allow your friends to call you by that name? What of your noble, blessed name, bestowed upon you by the revered Xianren, our elders...?
What? What’s goin’ on with her…?
Hong Lu reached out and, gently yet indifferently, held his mother’s violently trembling hands.
Of course I would, mother.
Because the name is too noble indeed.
Oh...! Ah, ah. Yes. It is not a name that any rabble should so heedlessly speak…
Of course, of course…
Oh, do you also have an old name and a new name?
Well, don’tcha remember~? Back in P Corp., Wei called Hong Lu ‘young master Baoyu’.

Also, remember how he announced himself before that duel on the day we arrived at H Corp.? He introduced himself as 'Baoyu of the Jia family'. I thought it was a pseudonym back then though, given the circumstances.
Well... it ain't like us callin' your real name's gonna cheapen its 'nobility', or whatever... tsk.
Hehe, it’s just a name, so you can say it as many times as you want and it won't depreciate in whatever value it has. Oh, but some people do actually believe that it does, I suppose.
It was… wise of you to refrain from using that name.
Right, right. To let your precious name be known among the plebeian populace is to encourage knives in the dark to strike. Even here, too...
It is as your mother says. Were your true name to be made known, any individual with a passing connection to H Corp. would have easily connected you to Hongyuan.
It is said that most names are repositories of their keepers' origins.
In the eastern region of the City, when the parents name their children, they imbue them with meaning; it carries their wish for their children's place and use in the world.
… You. What’s your name mean?
My name… My name is a culmination of wishes, not only those of my parents, but those of many more.
It means that I was born with a precious jade.
Jia Baoyu…
Tsk, awful. Hong Lu’s better.
<size=80%>At least try to whisper!</size>
Eugh, I’ll call the rich boy however I want to. If I'm ever forced to call 'im ‘young master Baoyu~’ or some servile shite like that, I’d rather take a punch or two from the guide.
I could feel the horrified gaze of the servants staring at us.
Hehe. I don’t mind, so please continue to call me Hong Lu if you want.
Please seat yourselves, honored guests. The food will be served soon.
Oi... what's all this?
Do they actually expect us to eat all this?
<... I don’t think I’ve ever been intimidated by food before.>
There was, quite literally, a mountain of dishes on the table—I was starting to wonder if the purpose of these dishes was more to flaunt their wealth than to feed us a reasonable amount of food.
What a feast! I can ask for re... refills, right? Ehehe...
Huh? Um, yes...
<Anyway, what's up with those empty seats over there? Are we still killing time for some guests to arrive...?>
Mm…
I don’t think so. They’re probably seats for my older siblings somewhere in Daguanyuan. They probably just didn’t want to attend.
This is a banquet to welcome me, after all. I’m sure they believe it’s a waste of time to attend.
Man, they better be on some real busy schedule to miss this…
Jia Mu, venerated be her presence, graces us!
Jia Mu, venerated be her presence, graces us!
With the announcement, utter silence quickly devoured the busy hubbub of the banquet...
Those who were sitting quickly rose to their feet and bowed, while those who were standing knelt down on all fours, their backs bent so low that their foreheads were nearly touching the floor.
And the woman walking out from between them, the crowd itself parting down the middle from her sheer presence...
Oh, there's grandmother.
... was Hong Lu's grandmother, the Family Hierarch of H Corp., and its Chief Executive Director.
Jia Mu's presence was at once warm, gentle, yet immense and overwhelming, like a personification of an insurmountable mountain.

dataList.title: Daguanyuan
dataList.content: We are graced by your presence, venerable Jia Mu.
We are graced by your presence, venerable Jia Mu.
W-whuh? Should we bow, too?
I don’t think you could bow any lower with your face halfway in the bowl, so you should be fine... probably...?
S-she’s surrounded by Heishou too, I think.
<Guys, everything’s gonna be fine as long as we don’t do anything stupid…>
As everyone was bowing before Jia Mu, awed and humbled...
... only Hong Lu looked straight at Jia Mu without bowing.
Then, he got up from his seat and walked toward her.
It has been a while, grandmother.

dataList.title: Daguanyuan
dataList.content: Please ascend, young master Baoyu.
It seemed that a special permission was needed to even stand next to her, as Hong Lu was allowed to approach her only after the servant gave him the go ahead.
Little Baoyu.
You must have walked and toiled tirelessly on your journey home.
Not at all, grandmother. I was able to learn so many new things, thanks to everyone who treated me so nicely.
Had you sought to master the art of learning, no master, regardless of pursuit, would have been out of our reach; you could have learned much in the halls of erudition from them.
Yet the world taught from sheets of paper are simply that—words on paper.
We wished that you, dear Baoyu, would learn more of the secular world, to not let flow betwixt your fingers the time that is given to you.
I know this opportunity was more than what I deserved, grandmother.
I appreciate your return all the same, that you have deigned to return before me ere my abdication of the great responsibility.
Verily, it appeareth that young Hong Lew shigned onto Limbews Chompany ash a gran churismo of shorts! Mmhm.
Gran chewrismo? Whash' shaat?
… Can the two of you stop babbling with your mouths full?

Young masters of families moooooost eminent are oft sent out to the world on a grand tour—thus coined was this practice 'gran turismo', if thou wilt—afore they are to commence their public activities!
Mm. The purpose is to learn the varied experiences that cannot be gained from books, to grow familiar with the world outside.
I hear that you have met with Xichun in the world not long ago?
I have.
A bright child, she is. Well-prepared to take on the challenges of the Family Hierarch Evaluations, I presume.
I agree. I am sure Xichun will wisely overcome the trials.
Indeed.
Have you paid visit to the revered elders, then?
... I will, soon.
Lady Wang, ascend here as well.
With your mercy, Jia Mu, of course...
Hong Lu’s mother hurried up to where Jia Mu stood.
It must cause your heart great distress to have your one and only son depart his home, to wander the world beyond the hedges.
O-of course not, Jia Mu…
Oh, I am simply so glad that my son, Baoyu...
… has returned as a man who can now more than carry his own weight... And unharmed, too...
Thus, dear Baoyu…
I don’t mean to rush, but… when are you planning to depart again?
Nothing has been decided yet, mother.
I see… I-I am simply concerned that, were your stay here to be prolonged, perhaps you might fade before your duties are completed.
Complete your duties and return soon, so that the… agreement Jia Mu has so graciously made for us is fulfilled, hmm?
Indeed.
Lose not, forget not.
You are our family's one and only jade.
Dear Baoyu, our peerless treasure, tarry not overlong in this mundane world; leave when the time is right, and fulfill your worth.
Okay, grandmother. Mother.
